#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

ll ans[30];
int main()
{
    ll i,t,n;

    ans[1]=0;
    ans[2]=1;
    for(i=2;i<21;i++)
    {
       ans[i]=ans[i-1]*i;
       if(i%2==0)
            ans[i]++;
       else ans[i]--;
    }

    cin>>t;
    while(t)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cout<<ans[n]<<endl;
        t--;
    }

    return 0;
}
